sentences.sContent: I endured the shyness and the pain of jealousness.
sentences.sContent_eng: I endured the shyness and the pain of jealousness.
sentences.sCn: 我既忍受着羞怯，又忍受着嫉妒的折磨；

sentences.sContent: When my play was with thee I never questioned who thou wert. I knew nor shyness nor fear, my life was boisterous.
sentences.sContent_eng: When my play was with thee I never questioned who thou wert. I knew nor shyness nor fear, my life was boisterous.
sentences.sCn: 当我是同你做游戏的时候，我从来没有问过你是谁．我不懂得羞怯和惧怕，我的生活是热闹的．

words.tran: 害羞地；羞怯地；胆怯地；小心地
